effects: Inflict one random status effect (35%) to one enemy
name: Little Devil

작은 악동 천사

desc_short: Randomly poison, blind, put to sleep, silence, paralyze, confuse, disease, or petrify one enemy
隨機對1名敵人施加中毒失明睡眠沉默麻痺混亂生病石化效果
적 1명에게 무작위로 독, 암흑, 수면, 침묵, 마비, 혼란, 질병, 석화 부여
Inflige aléatoirement poison, cécité, sommeil, silence, paralysie, confusion, maladie ou pétrification à un ennemi
Fügt einem Gegner zuf. Gift, Blind, Schlaf, Stille, Lähmung, Konfus, Virus oder Stein zu.
Inflige al azar ven, ceg, sue, sil, par, con, enf o pie a un enemigo
